wordGroup: plastic surgeon 整形外科医生
surgeon general 卫生局局长；军医处处长
orthopedic surgeon 整形外科医生；骨科医师

sentences.en: He followed his father and became a surgeon.
sentences.cn: 他沿袭了他父亲，成了一名外科医生。

sentences.en: He is reputed to be the best heart surgeon in the country.
sentences.cn: 他号称是这个国家最好的心脏外科医生。

sentences.en: The surgeon would pick up his instruments, probe, repair, and stitch up again.
sentences.cn: 外科医生会拿起器械进行探查、修复，然后再缝合。
